forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 50. West wind around 2 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 2 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the city awakens beneath a cloak of soft clouds that usher in a tranquil chill. The temperature hovers around fifty, marking an inviting yet cool start to the day. The gentle westward breeze is a whisper, only stirring the serene stillness. By midday, the clouds will disperse, revealing a mostly sunny expanse with temperatures gently edging toward sixty-two before sliding back into the comforting embrace of the afternoon chill, reminiscent of a late autumn day.

The horizon, while initially veiled, will gradually unfurl into clarity, exposing the iconic outline of the Golden Gate in the distance. Yet, expect the remnants of last night's marine layer to cling stubbornly to the coast, a reminder of the ocean's presence, rendering parts of the day mist-laden and ethereal. To navigate this cool and at times brisk atmosphere, layers are key; a light sweater or jacket will serve well, allowing for ease in adjusting to the warming sun. With such inviting weather, why not take a gentle stroll through the Presidio, perhaps losing yourself among the towering trees and lingering vistas, or find a cozy café to sip a warm brew and watch the city slowly awaken from its foggy slumber?
